body:
hey Everyone, i would just like to say that i love this server!
I like some of the original ideas and the awesome games!
But what stands out for me a lot is the unique website and how  you can check out every single stat, like you can see your kills, deaths (K/D), your ranking, etc. and i find that awesome!
I dont know who will be reading this but i just want the creators and staff to know that this server is wicked!
Also, while i'm here, i just have a question: What exactly are the emerald, gold, etc. ranks and how do you get them?
Is it from getting to level 50 or something?

Dunno - Thanks Guys,
OPTOBAT
body_tagged:

I dont know who will be reading this but i just want the creators and staff to know that this server is wicked!
Also, while i'm here, i just have a question: What exactly are the emerald, gold, etc. ranks and how do you get them?
Is it from getting to level 50 or something?

Dunno - Thanks Guys,
OPTOBAT
title: My First Post!

replies.body:
First of all, Hi!!! It's great to see new people!!
Emerald, Gold, and Diamond are the standard donator ranks
you purchase them under the category "shop" at the top
They all come with different perks, to enhance gameplay!
For example, gold and above allows you to join any team you want!
Plus, you get a greater xp gain from killing people! (the more xp, the higher your level)
They are all better than eachthoer
Gold - $25
Emerald - $50
Diamond - $100
replies.body_tagged:

Gold - $25
Emerald - $50
Diamond - $100

replies.body:
If you get to level 50 in any gamemode, you can just type
/prestige
and POOF! all your levels are gone, but if you type in chat...
you'll have a coloured star next to your name!
There are 5 different prestiges in all
replies.body_tagged:
If you get to level 50 in any gamemode, you can just type
/prestige
and POOF! all your levels are gone, but if you type in chat...
you'll have a coloured star next to your name!
There are 5 different prestiges in all

replies.body: Wait so for each prestige, you get a new star?
replies.body_tagged: Wait so for each prestige, you get a new star?

replies.body:
Yes.
I'm pretty sure it goes...
Pink Star (1)
Green Star (2)
Blue Star (3)
Red Star (4)
Yellow Star (5)

Hello, welcome to the community! This is one of the best communities I've ever been in, personally. I really like the forums and profile, too, I just think it's really cool :D  
Also, have you tried out Nebula yet? I think it's the best. Have fun playing here! (:

replies.body:
Hey hey and welcome to the Avicus forum community! Hopefully you like it here :)

Gold, Emerald and Diamond are all donator ranks which are given to users who donate X amount of money to help fund and maintain Avicus.

You can find the shop at: http://avicus.net/shop
As you may notice, there are two different types of payment options available. The "Subscription" option lets you donate in chunks. For example; Gold is $5/month, Emerald is $10/month and Diamond is $20/month. You can cancel the subscription whenever you feel like it! The second option is a "One Time" payment. You donate the full price, and your donator rank lasts forever!
replies.body_tagged:

As you may notice, there are two different types of payment options available. The "Subscription" option lets you donate in chunks. For example; Gold is $5/month, Emerald is $10/month and Diamond is $20/month. You can cancel the subscription whenever you feel like it! The second option is a "One Time" payment. You donate the full price, and your donator rank lasts forever!
